newsitem.title: USA: Zydeco files to offer two million shares.
newsitem.headline: Zydeco files to offer two million shares.

text.p: Zydeco Energy Inc said Friday it filed with the U.S. Securities and Exchange Commission for a public offering of two million shares of common stock.

The oil and natural gas exploration company it would use proceeds from the offering to finance the purchase of leaseholds and seismic data associated with its West Cameron Seismic Project and for drilling participation costs and other general purposes.
The registration statement filed with the SEC is not yet effective, the company said.
